verses.verse: Moreover the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>
Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> set<WH7760> thy face<WH6440> against<WH5921> mount<WH2022> Seir,<WH8165> and prophesy<WH5012> against<WH5921> it,

And say<WH559> unto it, Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2009> O mount<WH2022> Seir,<WH8165> I am against<WH413> thee, and I will stretch out<WH5186> mine hand<WH3027> against<WH5921> thee, and I will make<WH5414> thee most desolate.<WH8077> <WH4923>
I will lay<WH7760> thy cities<WH5892> waste,<WH2723> and thou<WH859> shalt be<WH1961> desolate,<WH8077> and thou shalt know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

Because <WH3282> thou hast had<WH1961> a perpetual<WH5769> hatred,<WH342> and hast shed<WH5064> the blood of<WH853> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> by<WH5921> the force<WH3027> of the sword<WH2719> in the time<WH6256> of their calamity,<WH343> in the time<WH6256> that their iniquity<WH5771> had an end: <WH7093>

Therefore, <WH3651> as I<WH589> live,<WH2416> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> I will prepare<WH6213> thee unto blood,<WH1818> and blood<WH1818> shall pursue<WH7291> thee: sith<WH518> thou hast not<WH3808> hated<WH8130> blood,<WH1818> even blood<WH1818> shall pursue<WH7291> thee.
Thus will I make<WH5414> <WH853> mount<WH2022> Seir<WH8165> most desolate,<WH8077> <WH8077> and cut off<WH3772> from<WH4480> it him that passeth out<WH5674> and him that returneth.<WH7725>

And I will fill<WH4390> <WH853> his mountains<WH2022> with his slain<WH2491> men: in thy hills,<WH1389> and in thy valleys,<WH1516> and in all<WH3605> thy rivers,<WH650> shall they fall<WH5307> that are slain<WH2491> with the sword.<WH2719>
I will make<WH5414> thee perpetual<WH5769> desolations,<WH8077> and thy cities<WH5892> shall not<WH3808> return:<WH3427> and ye shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

Because <WH3282> thou hast said,<WH559> <WH853> These two<WH8147> nations<WH1471> and these two<WH8147> countries<WH776> shall be<WH1961> mine, and we will possess<WH3423> it; whereas the LORD<WH3068> was<WH1961> there: <WH8033>

Therefore, <WH3651> as I<WH589> live,<WH2416> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> I will even do<WH6213> according to thine anger,<WH639> and according to thine envy<WH7068> which<WH834> thou hast used<WH6213> out of thy hatred<WH4480> <WH8135> against them; and I will make myself known<WH3045> among them, when<WH834> I have judged<WH8199> thee.

And thou shalt know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD,<WH3068> and that I have heard<WH8085> <WH853> all<WH3605> thy blasphemies<WH5007> which<WH834> thou hast spoken<WH559> against<WH5921> the mountains<WH2022> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> They are laid desolate,<WH8074> they are given<WH5414> us to consume.<WH402>
Thus with your mouth<WH6310> ye have boasted<WH1431> against<WH5921> me, and have multiplied<WH6280> your words<WH1697> against<WH5921> me: I<WH589> have heard<WH8085> them.
Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> When the whole<WH3605> earth<WH776> rejoiceth,<WH8055> I will make<WH6213> thee desolate.<WH8077>

As thou didst rejoice<WH8057> at the inheritance<WH5159> of the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> because<WH5921> <WH834> it was desolate,<WH8074> so<WH3651> will I do<WH6213> unto thee: thou shalt be<WH1961> desolate,<WH8077> O mount<WH2022> Seir,<WH8165> and all<WH3605> Idumea,<WH123> even all<WH3605> of it: and they shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>
